# TribeBharat E-commerce Website

This is a React-based e-commerce website for selling clothes with the following structure:

## Project Structure
- Frontend: React + Vite
- Routing: React Router DOM
- State Management: React Context API
- Styling: CSS with responsive design
- Backend: Node.js + Express (to be implemented)
- Database: SQL Server (to be implemented)

## Key Features
- User authentication (login/signup)
- Product catalog with categories (Men, Women, Kids, Accessories)
- Product filtering by price and color
- Product detail pages with image slider
- Shopping cart functionality
- Responsive design

## Component Architecture
- Pages: Home, Login, SignUp, Men, Women, Product
- Components: Header, Footer
- Context: AuthContext, CartContext
- Services: API integration (to be implemented)

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow consistent naming conventions
- Maintain responsive design principles
- Implement proper error handling
- Use proper TypeScript if converting from JavaScript

## Backend Requirements (To be implemented)
- Express.js REST API
- User authentication with JWT
- Product management endpoints
- SQL Server database integration
- File upload for product images
